message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERINGAPPROVALCRITERION_FV_CRITERION_EMPTY
message.locale: At least one Criterion must be selected.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERINGAPPROVALCRITERION_FV_COMMENTS_LONG
message.locale: Comments must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERINGAPPROVALCRITERION_XRV_CANNOT_CREATE_CRITERION_ALREADY_EXISTS_WITH_STARTDATE
message.locale: The Approval Criterion %1c already exists from %2d.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERINGAPPROVALCRITERION_XRV_CANNOT_CREATE_CRITERION_ALREADY_EXISTS_WITH_STARTDATE_AND_ENDDATE
message.locale: The Approval Criterion %1c already exists from %2d to %3d.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEROFFERINGAPPROVALCRITERION_FV_MODIFY_SERVICE_OFFERING_ID
message.locale: The Service for this Criterion cannot be modified.
